email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out with a freight offer for a shipment of crude oil from Rotterdam to Singapore. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, we were hoping for something in the low 50s, say $50.75. Can you check with the owner if they can adjust? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve discussed with the owner, and they’re willing to adjust the freight rate to $51.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $51.00 is acceptable. Can we confirm the laycan as 15-20 October and the demurrage rate at $20,000 per day? Also, please send over the full vessel details for our records. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $51.00 works for you. Yes, the laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October, and the demurrage rate is $20,000 per day. Attached are the full vessel details for the MV Ocean Star. Let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the fixture. Please send over the contract for review. Thanks for your help. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! I’ll have the contract drafted and sent over to you by end of day. Thanks for your prompt responses throughout. Looking forward to working together. Best regards, Sarah
